pages.title: Rotor Blade
pages.text: The Rotor Blade is the last component of your $(l:turbine/rotor)Rotor$(/l), but it's the one that will make it spin.$(br2)A Rotor Blade can only be placed perpendicularly to a $(l:turbine/part-rotorshaft)Rotor Shaft$(/l) block or beside an already placed Blade, moving away from the shaft block.
$(l)Mandatory:$() yes$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() inside the Turbine, connected to another Blade or a Rotor Shaft block$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no
